title: CreateTaskRequest
description: Payload for creating a new task within a project

projectId.description: ID of the project this task belongs to (required)

parentId.description: Optional ID of parent task for creating hierarchical task relationships

title.description: Brief, descriptive title of the task (required)

description.description: Optional detailed description of what needs to be accomplished
examples: Implement OAuth 2.0 authentication flow with support for Google and GitHub providers

priority.description: Optional priority level for task execution. Defaults to 'medium' if not specified

initialPrompt.description: Optional initial prompt or instruction for this task
examples: Build a login page with email and password fields

skillIds.description: Optional array of skill identifiers to assign to this task
